alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Gosper; Hall; Harlan; Howard; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 1:12AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Phelps, northwestern Kearney, Buffalo, Gosper, Sherman, Dawson, southwestern Howard, north central Harlan and northwestern Hall Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 111 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mason City to 6 miles southwest of Eddyville to near Eustis. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Automated Weather Observation. Wind gusts between 45 and 50 mph have been reported at a few mesonet stations in western Dawson County. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Litchfield around 125 AM CDT. Sumner, Hazard and Smithfield around 130 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Miller, Bertrand, Ravenna, Loomis, Amherst, Rockville, Atlanta, Kearney, Holdrege, Funk, Riverdale and Boelus. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 275. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Dawson; Gosper; Hall; Harlan; Howard; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman
